Hi! I am currently a PhD candidate at [Optima Group](https://optima.cs.cityu.edu.hk/), Department of Computer Science, City University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. [Hau-San Wong](https://scholars.cityu.edu.hk/en/persons/cshswong/) and Prof. [Qingfu Zhang](https://www.cs.cityu.edu.hk/~qzhan7/index.html) since 2023 fall. I‚Äôm also fortunate to work closely with Prof. [Wei Huang](https://weihuang05.github.io) and Prof. [Andi Han](https://andihan3.github.io/). Before that, I completed my B.S degree in 2023 in Mathematics at Xi'an Jiaotong University, advised by Prof. [Hui Li](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=BhgtoWMAAAAJ) and mentored by Prof. [Jian Sun](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=SSgNWOMAAAAJ&hl=En).

I am currently an incoming one-year intern at CFAR, A*STAR, where I will be supervised by Prof. [Atsushi Nitanda](https://sites.google.com/site/atsushinitanda/home). Prior to this, I spent one year (2024‚Äì2025) as a research intern at the University of Tokyo, working at the [Deep Learning Theory Team](https://www.riken.jp/en/research/labs/aip/generic_tech/deep_learn_theory/index.html) at RIKEN AIP under the supervision of Prof. [Taiji Suzuki](https://ibis.t.u-tokyo.ac.jp/suzuki/). Earlier, from January to May 2023, I was a research assistant in the [LOGO](https://mypage.cuhk.edu.cn/academics/yutianshu/LOGO.html) Lab at The Chinese University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. [Tianshu Yu](https://mypage.cuhk.edu.cn/academics/yutianshu/).

My research broadly covers theoretical foundations of deep learning, distribution optimization, mean-field optimization, sampling and reinforcement learning.

You can find a full list of my papers on [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=ja&user=mWrnNqsAAAAJ&view_op=list_works&sortby=pubdate).

## üìä Site statistics

::: {.site-views-chart-container}
```{python}
# | echo: false
# fmt: off
import pandas as pd, altair as alt
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from google.analytics.data_v1beta import BetaAnalyticsDataClient
from google.analytics.data_v1beta.types import DateRange, Dimension, Metric, RunReportRequest
from google.oauth2 import service_account


key, pid = "ga-dakebu-5c9fdbc20e9e.json", "514471754"
creds = service_account.Credentials.from_service_account_file(key)
client = BetaAnalyticsDataClient(credentials=creds)

# ---------- Past-year totals (views + users) ----------
resp_year = client.run_report(RunReportRequest(
    property=f"properties/{pid}",
    dimensions=[],
    metrics=[
        Metric(name="screenPageViews"),
        Metric(name="activeUsers")
    ],
    date_ranges=[DateRange(start_date="365daysAgo", end_date="yesterday")]
))

if resp_year.rows:
    total_views_365 = int(resp_year.rows[0].metric_values[0].value)
    total_users_365 = int(resp_year.rows[0].metric_values[1].value)
else:
    total_views_365 = 0
    total_users_365 = 0

# ---------- 1. Daily Views: 90 Days ----------
resp = client.run_report(RunReportRequest(
  property=f"properties/{pid}",
  dimensions=[Dimension(name="date")],
  metrics=[Metric(name="screenPageViews")],
  date_ranges=[DateRange(start_date="90daysAgo", end_date="yesterday")]
))

if resp.rows:
    df = pd.DataFrame([{
      "date": datetime.strptime(r.dimension_values[0].value, "%Y%m%d"),
      "views": int(r.metric_values[0].value)
    } for r in resp.rows]).sort_values("date")

    cap_99 = df["views"].quantile(0.99)
    total_views_90 = int(df["views"].sum())
    total_views_90_win = int(df["views"].clip(upper=cap_99).sum())

    # Stats text
    print(f'Last Updated:              {datetime.today().strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}')
    print(f"Total Visitors (365 Days): {total_users_365:,}")
    print(f"Total Views (365 Days):    {total_views_365:,}")
    print(f"Total Views (90 Days):     {total_views_90:,}")
    print(f"Total Views (90 Days):     {total_views_90_win:,} (winsorized at 99%)")

    # Line chart
    start_30d = df["date"].max() - timedelta(days=30)
    xscale = alt.Scale(domain=[start_30d, df["date"].max()])
    df["views"] = df["views"].clip(lower=0, upper=df["views"].quantile(0.99))

    alt.renderers.set_embed_options(actions=False)
    line_chart = alt.Chart(df).mark_line(point=True).encode(
      x=alt.X("date:T", title=None, scale=xscale, axis=alt.Axis(format="%b %d")),
      y=alt.Y("views:Q", title="Views"),
      tooltip=["date:T", "views:Q"]
    ).properties(
      title="üìà Daily Site Views (Past 90 Days), winsorized at 99%",
      width="container",
      height=300
    ).interactive()
else:
    print(f'Last Updated:              {datetime.today().strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}')
    print(f"Total Visitors (365 Days): {total_users_365:,}")
    print(f"Total Views (365 Days):    {total_views_365:,}")
    print(f"Total Views (90 Days):     0")
    print(f"Total Views (90 Days):     0 (winsorized at 99%)")

    df = pd.DataFrame({"date": [], "views": []})
    line_chart = alt.Chart(df).mark_line().encode(
      x=alt.X("date:T", title=None),
      y=alt.Y("views:Q", title="Views"),
    ).properties(
      title="üìà Daily Site Views (Past 90 Days), winsorized at 99%",
      width="container",
      height=300
    )

line_chart
```

```{python}
# | echo: false
# fmt: off
# ---- 2. Views by Country: 90 Days ----
resp_country = client.run_report(RunReportRequest(
  property=f"properties/{pid}",
  dimensions=[Dimension(name="country")],
  metrics=[Metric(name="screenPageViews")],
  date_ranges=[DateRange(start_date="90daysAgo", end_date="yesterday")]
))

if resp_country.rows:
    df_country = pd.DataFrame([{
      "region": row.dimension_values[0].value,
      "views": int(row.metric_values[0].value)
    } for row in resp_country.rows])

    df_country = df_country[df_country["views"] > 0].sort_values("views", ascending=False).head(20)
else:
    df_country = pd.DataFrame({"region": [], "views": []})

# Plot 2: Bar chart
bar_chart = alt.Chart(df_country).mark_bar().encode(
  x=alt.X("views:Q", title="Views"),
  y=alt.Y("region:N", sort="-x", title=None),
  tooltip=["region:N", "views:Q"]
).properties(
  title="üåç Top 20 Regions by Views (Past 90 Days)",
  width="container",
  height=400
)

bar_chart
```
